div.h1: Ferris Independent School DistrictEducating Students. Enriching Lives.

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Ferris Independent School District » About » District Closure

table.style: border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); width: 100%;

td.style: width: 100%; background-color: rgb(231, 87, 0); text-align: center; vertical-align: middle;

strong.span: PARA ESPAÑOL POR FAVOR CAMBIE EL IDIOMA (LANGUAGE) EN LA PARTE SUPERIOR DE ESTA PÁGINA.

td.style: text-align: left; vertical-align: middle; background-color: rgb(231, 87, 0);

img.style: border-width: initial; border-style: none; width: 570px; height: auto !important; text-align: center;

p.style: font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center; margin: 10px 0px;
font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
p.span: Though we are apart right now for our health and safety, we at Ferris ISD continue to support each other as a community, and right now we must work together to fight COVID-19. In order to help prevent the spread of COVID-19, we will be reaching out to you via email, phone, text message, and social media over the next two weeks to share vitally important guidance.

p.style: font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
p.span: This guidance is based on what scientists know about how to prevent the spread of COVID-19, and it is our hope that you will continue doing all you can to follow these practices and share them with your friends and family.

p.style: font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
p.span: Thank you for what you are doing to educate your children at home and all the efforts you’re making to keep your family healthy and safe. We know this is a difficult time. If we stand apart as a community during this stretch and continue following the public health practices we will be sharing over the coming days, we will be back together soon.

p.style: font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;
font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;

font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px;

td.style: background-color: rgb(231, 87, 0); width: 30%; text-align: center; vertical-align: top;
